publications.title: Informe Encuesta Sentimiento del Viajero. Junio 2020
publications.description:
Este informe refleja los resultados de la encuesta ‚ÄúSentimiento del Viajero‚Äù realizada con colaboraci√≥n de DOT Hotels & Resorts a 830 turistas de diferentes pa√≠ses de Sudam√©rica durante los meses de mayo/junio del a√±o 2020.
El objetivo de la misma fue entender sobre el deseo (destinos, transporte, tipos de alojamiento, servicios, medios de compra, entre otros) y la planificaci√≥n de viajes de los turistas en el corto/mediano plazo.

La industria del turismo de Argentina tendr√° que redise√±ar estrategias para captar la atenci√≥n de un mercado nacional que tendr√° que optar por alternativas nacionales a la hora de elegir donde viajar.

publications.title: Market Report "Argentina: Low-Cost Airlines"
publications.description:
Desde su creaci√≥n, el mercado a√©reo argentino ha estado extremadamente cerrado. Esto provoc√≥ una concentraci√≥n de rutas a pocas ciudades, lo que signific√≥ precios m√°s altos y un servicio al cliente deficiente.
Pero la situaci√≥n comenz√≥ a cambiar en el a√±o 2017 con la apertura del mercado a los jugadores 'low cost', promoviendo nuevas rutas e instalaciones tanto para locales como para turistas extranjeros.
Este modelo de negocio, que genera muchas pol√©micas, enfrentar√° oportunidades y desaf√≠os en el mercado argentino, que solo el futuro dir√° si ser√°n rentables.

publications.title: Latam & Caribbean Hotels & Chains Report 2017
publications.description:
En base a una recopilaci√≥n de informaci√≥n sobre aproximadamente 3.500 hoteles de cadenas nacionales e internacionales ubicados en 690 ciudades de Am√©rica Latina y el Caribe, lo cu√°l totaliza m√°s de 610.000 habitaciones, hemos podido realizar un informe que presenta resultados sobre distintas variables de mercado relacionadas a la participaci√≥n de las cadenas nacionales e internacionales en el mercado hotelero de cada pa√≠s analizado.
Claramente la regi√≥n tiene una enorme potencial tur√≠stico y hotelero que a√∫n est√° poco desarrollado.

publications.title: Market Report "Argentina: Low-Cost Airlines"
publications.description:
Desde su creaci√≥n, el mercado a√©reo argentino ha estado extremadamente cerrado. Esto provoc√≥ una concentraci√≥n de rutas a pocas ciudades, lo que signific√≥ precios m√°s altos y un servicio al cliente deficiente.
Pero la situaci√≥n comenz√≥ a cambiar en el a√±o 2017 con la apertura del mercado a los jugadores 'low cost', promoviendo nuevas rutas e instalaciones tanto para locales como para turistas extranjeros.
Este modelo de negocio, que genera muchas pol√©micas, enfrentar√° oportunidades y desaf√≠os en el mercado argentino, que solo el futuro dir√° si ser√°n rentables.

En base a una recopilaci√≥n de informaci√≥n sobre aproximadamente 3.500 hoteles de cadenas nacionales e internacionales ubicados en 690 ciudades de Am√©rica Latina y el Caribe, lo cu√°l totaliza m√°s de 610.000 habitaciones, hemos podido realizar un informe que presenta resultados sobre distintas variables de mercado relacionadas a la participaci√≥n de las cadenas nacionales e internacionales en el mercado hotelero de cada pa√≠s analizado.
Claramente la regi√≥n tiene una enorme potencial tur√≠stico y hotelero que a√∫n est√° poco desarrollado.

headline: Product Manager | Certified Scrum Master
about:
Bachelor‚Äôs in Foreign Trade with solid experience in the development and implementation of both product, and product marketing strategies for both B2C and B2B multinational companies.
Product development and Product marketing strategy definition.
Strong ability to work as a part of a team.
Passionate about technology.

experience.description:
My responsibilities are:
Prioritization of needs according to business and product requirements.
Development of the product roadmap, aligned with the company's vision. 
Responsible for leading the launch of the company's new website.
Guided the team in implementing Scrum as a work methodology to enhance collaboration and productivity.
Multidisciplinary teams‚Äô coordination.
Strategic project planning.
Guide the team in implementing Scrum as a methodology, enhancing collaboration and productivity.
B2B, B2C and E-Commerce Product Manager.
Market trend analysis to develop and launch new products and introduce brands to expand product portfolio: 3 new brands introduced year to date (B2B and B2C).
Go to Market strategy definition (Product, Channel, and Price definition).
Business and new suppliers‚Äô development.
Price and specs comparison for technical products.

My responsibilities were:
Senior Product Manager in charge of Argentina, Uruguay, and Paraguay Markets for Consumer Inkjet business.
A key leader of a regional web development project, seeking better commercial planning and sales forecasting, implemented in the whole American continent.
Roadmap definition based on business needs.
Product Positioning.
Go to Market strategy definition.
Market and Competition Analysis.
Closely work with stakeholders, coordinating the work between different teams (Sales, Product, Developers, UX/UI team, etc.)
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align business and technical goals, maximizing product value.
Strategic definition of the product roadmap and backlog, prioritizing high-value features that drove profitability and growth in Latam (+20 new models successfully launched, achieving a 30% profitability).

My responsibilities were:
Product management for the Visual Display category in the IT Division for Argentina, Uruguay, and Paraguay.
Development and implementation of product strategies for B2B / B2C segments.
Product launches, and hands-on training.
Market analysis.
Development of channel strategies for vertical and transactional markets.
Closely work with stakeholders, coordinating the work between different teams (Sales, Product, Developers, UX/UI team, etc.).

My responsibilities were:
Management of in/outbound of CKD (complete knocked down) & SKD (semi-knocked down) for the entire lineup of the IT division.
Supervision of replenishments, claims, and RMA management.
Management and control of air and maritime shipments.
Analysis and supervision of tenders for businesses in vertical segments.
Management of product factories.
Supervision of the factory supply chain.
Demand management and supply of distribution channels.
Analysis and evaluation of forecast of IT products and sell out of each category.
Consolidation of management plan and sell-in / sell-out analysis of the IT business.

My responsibilities were:
Business management for Argentina, Uruguay, Paraguay, and Bolivia.
Purchase, sale, and logistics management of the lineup of the Metal, Steel, and Plant division.
Management and supervision of importers, exporters, and distribution channels.
Analysis and evaluation of the oil industry and relationship with automotive companies and EPCs.
Management of new businesses, operations, and markets in vertical segments.
Analysis and Development of new and potential customers. Capture and maturation of new and potential Business Opportunities.
Establishment and negotiation of commercial conditions, prices, terms, and financing.
Evaluation and management of projects for national and international tenders.

My responsibilities were:
Management of the export sector and integral control of the commercial operation.
Coordination of LCL and FCL loads of general and refrigerated cargo.
Reservations with maritime lines and NVOCC.
Management of direct customers and Customs brokers.
Relationship with offices across the country and agents abroad.
Analysis and development of export documentation.
Coordination of national and international land charges.
Management and supervision of Maritime Export for Techint Group.

My responsibilities were:
Export Executive for traffic from Brazil, USA, Hamburg, Barcelona, Durban, and Singapore.
Coordination of LCL and FCL loads and reservations with maritime lines.
Contact with tax warehouse, freight forwarders, and forwarders.
Development of commercial documentation for export.
Preparation and emission of Bill of Ladings. 
Shipping declarations to maritime lines.
Customer service and contact with Agents.

education.insights:

Strategic communication and effective Media Management.
Great idea application: Play / Buy / Share.
Digital Marketing: Trends and implementation of new digital tools.

Activities and societies: Partner Management simulation process in 5 stages:
Plan - Recruitment - Commitment - Enabling - Measurement.
Management and development of relationships with strategic partners.
Redefine the traditional channels model towards the opening of new business routes.

headline: Ingeniera en Organizaci√≥n Industrial | Log√≠stica | Gesti√≥n de Proyectos | Mejora continua
about:
Ingeniera Industrial con una fuerte ambici√≥n por alcanzar grandes metas. Me apasiona explorar nuevas experiencias, practicar deportes y colaborar en equipo. about:
I have all my experience in the telecommunication market. My first ten years in service delivery, as integrator and technical support.  Then, in the commercial area addressing different jobs, as account manager, as technical presales, bid preparations, and others; attending and developing business opportunities with the customers. 
I was a referent leader and general coordinator for the group assigned in each project during this time period, in order to achieve the most optimal technical solution selection aligned with the selected commercial model strategy for the offer preparation, having the objective the win of the business through the offer competitiveness..

Professionalism and perseverance are some of the value in me I used to get the objectives. Great team player with good communication and natural leading skills. High learning aptitude and knowledge sharing capability.

experience.description:
-	Consulting in the security domain at MasMovil, MasOrange network in Spain
-	Audit and engineering of FortiNet and Juniper firewalls between different subdomain networks
-	Managing projects implementation in the 4G Core PS engineering department (EPG, SGSN/MME, SGW, PGW, legacy and CUPS based, 5G-NSA, PCC, PCG, LPG, SCP) at MasMovil, coordinating different areas to reach the objectives. Solution review and analysis. 
Network signaling issues analysis with statistics tools, Polystar protocol analysis, to evaluate different network procedures and protocols compliant with 3GPP standars for 5G and 4G Core, like  NGAP, S1AP, HTTP2/JSON, PFCP, Diameter (S6a, Gx, Ro), GTP, MAP, SS7, IP, etc.

Operation and mantenance for Ericsson AXE exchanges in Telef√≥nica de Espa√±a. Support on site technicians, troubleshooting on HW and SW issues. 

- AXE exchanges based on APZ212 60, APG43L, AZP212 20, APZ 212 33, APZ 212 30, IOG11, IOG20
- Siganlling issues for SIP, ISDN, ISUP, PSTN, SS7, V5.1, V5.2, INAP, MTP, X25, XoT, CS1+ INAP
- RSS Remote Subscriber Stage (EMG)
- EAR Engine Access Ramp
- MGW AXD 301, TeS TSS Telephony SoftSwitch
- Technical support , Level 1 and Level 2

Responsabilities: Line manager responsible in sales and presales. Consultative selling of new technology equipment. Select strategic partners to expand the services and products portfolio. Prepare quotations, proposals. Define margins and prices. Answer RFQ/RFP and tenders. Costs estimation. Define and present solutions. Develop business. Negotiate and agree commercial contracts. Identify, follow up and expand customer base and business opportunities

Sector: Commercial Account. Telecommunications (industrial market for electric power, oil & gas). Microwaves and its infrastructure (masts, towers, shelters, power units, battery packs). Industrial Multiplexers based on MPLS-TP and SDH technology. TCP/IP equipment, telephony exchanges, fiber optic fibers.

Responsabilities: Consultative selling of innovative solutions from transport portfolio, TV & media, OSS/BSS, added value services, mobile packet core. Proposal preparations for RFQ/RFI, tenders. Responsible in the commercial strategy, terms and conditions. Identify, evaluate and development of new business opportunities

Sector: Commercial Account. Cellular networks GSM/WCDMA/LTE/3G/4G, IMS, IP data networks, wireline networks, transport networks, microwave,IT/OSS/BSS solutions, IPTV, mobile TV and media, IoT, value added services solutions. Ericsson Expert Analytics (Customer Experience), Ericsson MCX Mobile Connect Accelerator, Speed Test App, Ericsson HDS 8000 (Hyperscale Datacenter System), Packet core network (2G/3G SGSN, MME, GGSN, Mobile packet network, SAPC PCRF, SASN PCEF) , Microwave portfolio, Ericsson Mobile Wallet, MVNO, M2M, Ericsson BSCS, Ericsson CS Charging System, Ericsson Order Care and Catalog Manager, Ericsson DSC Diameter Signaling Controller, IMS Solution, OTT/TV Multiscreen Solution, ADSL, CDN, SMS-C, MMS-C, WAP gateway.

experience.position: Technical Sales Manager at Ericsson Argentina
experience.description:
Technical Manager in the commercial account attending Telecom Argentina customer (owned by TIM Italia) and its subsidiaries for the whole portfolio of products solutions and services of Ericsson; for GSM/WCDMA/LTE cellular networks, wireline networks; transport, microwave and IP data networks, IT/OSS/BSS solutions; IPTV; value added services solutions (voice intelligent network, voice VPN, IMS solutions, MMS, SMS, mobile wallet, WAP gateway, content platform, Mobile TV, IPTV, etc).
Secure profitable sales through provision of innovative/effective customer solutions, a consultative selling approach and preserve customer relations.
Technical part of business development and customized solutions, end user application, and features in accordance to customer requirements or needs.
Global solution sales best-practices sharing and feedback to regarding new market opportunities, solutions.
Answering and preparation of RFP/RFQ according to customer requirements.
Presentation of products and solutions

Some of the most relevant project and presales projects: 
Mobile and 3G packet core network design and configuration 
Mobile packet network (routers, DNS, DHCP, firewalls)
3G GSNs node design and configuration
First trial of 3G data and streaming in Argentina
Design of MPBN/GPRS network for Tigo (Paraguay)

experience.position: Technical Support Specialist at Ericsson Argentina
experience.description:
Deliver of technical support services and integrations for the Ericsson product portfolio consisting of AXE exchanges SW for wireline networks, D-AMPS and GSM mobile networks, mobile packet core networks and y GPRS (SGSN, GGSN J20, routers, switches, DNS, WAP Gateway, Radius server), AXD 301/311 ATM switches.
Identify faults and troubleshoot these, according to a set of defined alternatives, and apply standard resolving processes in the network.
Market SW correction on PLEX-C for AXE exchanges.
Solutions design, System Integration and validation.

Some of the most relevant project: 
Design and integration of the first GPRS network for Telecom Personal and Movistar in Argentina 
Design and integration of the first GPRS network; for Personal Paraguay and Tigo in Paraguay. 
Fine Tunning of GPRS network in Cable and Wireless at panama City. 
Design and integration of Tigris ISP router to MSC for data access to D-AMPS mobile Netwrok
SS7 to ISDN PRI access for data access to mobile network
Design and integration of new ATM network with AXD 301 and AXD 3011 equipment for Diveo Argentina.

Installation, configuration and integration of AXE exchanges for wireline and MSCs of D-AMPS mobile networks.
Installation, configuration and integration of AXD 301 and AXD 311 ATM switches; and Tigris ISP routers.
On field implementation of the new Argentinian numbering plan for AXE exchanges.
I was on site team leader, coordinator and supervisor for the mounting and installation of AXE exchanges.

Some of the most relevant project: 
	D-AMPS MSC implementation and integration
Wireline exchanges implementation as part of the modernization plan for Telefonica Argentina
	Wireline PFNN implementation
	AXE SW Upgrades
	AXE HW Updates
	AXE CP changes

about:
Mi nombre es Lucas Gobbi, de nacionalidad Italo-Argentina, radicado en la ciudad de Valencia, Espa√±a, desde marzo del a√±o 2020.

Graduado en la carrera de Licenciatura en Administraci√≥n con especialidad en Finanzas, cuento con amplia experiencia en el √Årea Comercial y Financiera. M√°s de 18 a√±os en puestos ejecutivos, participando activamente en la toma de decisiones y colaborando con la Direcci√≥n, en la definici√≥n de las Estrategias Empresariales a mediano y largo plazo. 

Me apasionan las finanzas. Tengo una visi√≥n hol√≠stica de los negocios (Mirada 360); resultado de mi incursi√≥n en empresas de sectores muy diversos y a la interacci√≥n constante con los departamentos de Finanzas, Legales, RRHH, Marketing y Comercio Exterior. 

En cuanto a mis competencias destaco Liderazgo, Creatividad e Ingenio aplicada a la gesti√≥n de Equipos de Trabajo, la optimizaci√≥n de recursos y la consecuci√≥n de metas.

Actualmente ejerzo como Asesor Financiero - Agentes representante de Banco Mediolanum (Family Banker¬Æ).

El Family Banker¬Æ es el profesional de confianza responsable de asesorar al Cliente en sus decisiones de ahorro e inversi√≥n, d√°ndole respuestas personalizadas. Establece con el Cliente una relaci√≥n de confianza y de largo plazo. 
Su conocimiento de las necesidades financieras, de las circunstancias personales, de las caracter√≠sticas, de la situaci√≥n familiar, de la distribuci√≥n patrimonial, de sus preferencias en cuanto al riesgo financiero y de las expectativas del Cliente es lo que permite al Family Banker¬Æ proponer siempre las soluciones de ahorro e inversi√≥n personalizadas m√°s adecuadas adaptadas a las diferentes etapas de su vida. 

El Family Banker¬Æ es un profesional aut√≥nomo, registrado en el Banco de Espa√±a como Agente Representante de Banco Mediolanum, que tiene una s√≥lida formaci√≥n t√©cnica en finanzas y un amplio conocimiento de la evoluci√≥n de los mercados y la econom√≠a.

Competente en materias de directiva financiera MiFID (Markets in Financial Instruments Directive) con la certificaci√≥n EIP por la UPV. (Certificado por la Comisi√≥n Nacional del Mercado de Valores - CNMV. Acreditado por EFPA Espa√±a)

headline: GENERAL MANAGER BORJA VALVES
about:
A Results-oriented executive engineer with solid background managing companies, business account and major multidisciplinary projects, acquiring this know-how through more than 15 years working for the best EPC Companies of Spain in different sectors: Airports, Hospitals, Subways, Railways, HV/EHV Underground Grids, Substations, Overhead Lines, Singular Projects, Public Sector and Infrastructure as well as in several countries: Spain, LATAM, and the UK. 

Used to building multicultural and cross-functional teams from scratch, managing the grow up with leadership and motivational skills creating environments where the participation of all members contributing to achieving the goals defined.

Wide negotiation skills and consolidate expertise in purchasing and sales areas.  

Ability in helping define company direction developing the strategy, working on business development with new customers whilst maintaining the existing customer base, building profitable win+win business relationships with customer, suppliers and stakeholders. 

Willing always to cultivate the company reputation in the market contributing to strengthening the image of it

profileTopEducation.schoolName: Instituto Europeo de Posgrado - IEP business School

experience.description: Running the company's business growth and operational excellence, fostering team development and cultivating enduring, mutually beneficial relationships with customers and stakeholders.

experience.position: Project Manager, Worldwide EPC Turnkey Project Department
Country Manager at 3F Filippi Iberica S.L.U.
experience.description:
Lead the Spanish subsidiary of the brand into the Iberian market, build the cross-functional team from scratch. Fully responsible for the day to day running of the business with an emphasis on sales and business development for Spain and Portugal's market developing win+win strategies for the company.

Lighting System Manufacturer. Product line covers any possible indoor and outdoor application, combining the best lighting results with energy-saving features conceived for industry applications could be used also for infrastructure, houses and art galleries.

Responsible for the business account of the project. Management of Turnkey several kinds of project HV/EHV Underground between Spain and UK  for Energy Companies. Managing site supervisors team and subcontractors, assigning roles in the project to appropriate staff members, making sure works will be completed on time under budget and controlling the expenditure.

Electrical Cable Manufacturer. EPC Industrial, Installations, Energy, T&D and Infrastructure.
Global Turnkey and EMEA EnergyProjects for customers such as Energy Companies and Private Clients, in projects of High Voltage / Extra High Voltage Underground. Energy Business Unit and General Cable Corporation.

experience.companyName: ISOLUX CORSAN S.A., EPC T&D Division
experience.description: Responsible for the business account of the Project. Lead the Project Power Upgrade of Grid Electricity for new railways in the Subway ‚ÄúLine A‚Äù in Buenos Aires. Argentina. Managing an engineering team, site supervisors and subcontractors, assigning roles in the project to appropriate staff members, making sure works will be completed on time under budget and controlling the expenditure. Sectors EPC: Industrial, Installations, Energy, Transmission and Distribution and Infrastructure.

Sectors EPC: Industrial, Services and Infrastructure.

Responsible for the business account of the Project, lead the execution Remodeling Installation in Power Plant Leon Airport, managing an engineering team, site supervisors and subcontractors, controlling expenditure and making sure the project finish on time under budget, maximizing profits to the company. Sectors EPC: Industrial, Services and Infrastructure.

Responsible for installations of the project, lead the execution New Terminal Building and Electrical Facilities Phase 1 Ibiza Airport. Belong to the engineering team, managing site supervisors and subcontractors, controlling expenditure and making sure the project finish on time under budget, maximizing profits to the company. Sectors EPC: Industrial, Services and Infrastructure.

Oversee along with the project manager-site manager the resources needed to finish the projects on time under budget, controlling the expenditure to maximize the profits of the company.

headline: Compensation & Benefits
about:
Contadora con orientaci√≥n en el √°rea de Recursos Humanos. Experiencia en Relaciones Laborales, Compensaciones y Beneficios.
Perfil especialista con pensamiento anal√≠tico, autonom√≠a, proactividad, liderazgo y trabajo en equipo. Experiencia en metodolog√≠as √°giles. Orientada a resultados y mejora de procesos. Excelente capacidad de comunicaci√≥n y relacionamiento. Adaptabilidad y flexibilidad ante escenarios cambiantes.  B√∫squeda constante de aprendizaje y desarrollo personal y profesional.

experience.description:
- Global role for 13 countries
- Job evaluation, grading and job architecture
- Payband design
- Benchmarking
- Survey participation (Mercer Comptryx, Aon Radford, TAAP, Figures)
- Report preparation to analyse market positioning
- Data analytics calculation: turnover, churn, retention rate, headcount
- Global harmonization of benefits
- Salary review process: budget calculation, planning and execution
- VSOP

-	General coordination of compensations and payroll area.
-	Planning and execution of salary increase process
-	Analysis and research of the global market and design of pay bands
-	Analysis of salary position regarding the market and job structure
-	Counseling on salary proposals
-	Stock options plan: calculation of installments for employees based on the current model
-	Budget projection

-	Planning, optimization and execution of the core processes of the area (salary review, bonus program, incentives, LTI, etc.)
-	Analysis of salary evolution, wages position in the market, staffing costs and position structure (with emphasis on agile structures and IT)
-	Experience and management of MERCER valuation methodology
-	Structure assistance with emphasis on agile structures and IT
-	Job Offer development (entry, promotions, rotations and staff reduction)
-	Planning and execution of the company salary review and bonuses calculation
-	Analysis of market survey and salary grade design that allow keeping competitiveness in the market
-	Interaction with Business Partners and business leaders as an area model
-	Participation in improvement and automation projects of the area that allow supporting the vast business growth

-	Technical assessment regarding labor to Leaders
-	Penalty enforcement
-	Expertise and inspections management
-	Extended medical leaves follow up and management
-	Employee reduction tracking

-Atenci√≥n al cliente y contacto con proveedores
-Gesti√≥n de llamadas, correo electr√≥nico y documentaci√≥n.
-Gesti√≥n de archivo f√≠sico y digital
-Organizaci√≥n y gesti√≥n de agenda (citas, reuniones, viajes, etc.), estableciendo para ello los contactos y comunicaciones necesarias
-Apoyo a otros departamentos en tareas administrativas
-Coordinaci√≥n y seguimiento en la gesti√≥n de proyectos
-Elaboraci√≥n de bases de datos
-Registraci√≥n contable y conciliaciones bancarias
-Proceso de Facturaci√≥n y cobro

headline: SQL Developer for InfoQuest Systems Inc at ClearComp
about:
IT professional with extensive experience in SQL Server database technologies. Familiar with development in .Net languages and with leading teams in projects. Looking for new opportunities to keep developing my skills and work in interesting projects.
I'm open to remote positions or local ones in Rosario, Argentina

experience.position: SQL Developer for InfoQuest Systems Inc

experience.description: Working with multiple agencies on projects for their clients. Specialize on database development and performance troubleshooting in Microsoft technologies.

Developed database object as T-SQL, stored procedures, user defined functions, triggers, views, complicated queries, indexing, etc. Tune performance of procedures and queries.
Develop solution on Azure Data Factory .
Database design, administration and development on Azure PostgreSQL.

Defined technical requirements for new reporting database. Directed and designed the ETL process involving data quality and testing. Developed and documented Conceptual/Logical/Physical design. Developed database object as T-SQL, stored procedures, user defined functions, triggers, views, complicated queries, indexing, etc. Tune performance of  procedures and queries.

Lead team working on Unicode conversion effort on the database. Work together with the client DBA providing assistance on the issues they had and completing tasks assigned by him.
Performed database administrator duties. Handle performance troubleshooting and maintenance tasks. Work with the development team on improving the performance of database queries. Provide assistance to troubleshooting application issues.

SQL Server DBA for enterprise databases. Responsible for database architecture including the physical design. Performed installation of the software on database servers and carry out data migrations. Support teams on the enterprise environment during the project lifecycle and provide input about the data architecture and design.
Conducted extensive work on HA/DR technologies, including database mirroring, transactional replication, clustering, backup and recovery and ‚ÄúAlways On‚Äù technology.
Worked on automating SQL Server deployments, leveraging System Center tools ‚Äì such as Virtual Machine Manager (VMM), and Orchestrator (SCO).

Application DBA for Oracle databases. My tasks include provide support to application teams,address performance issues and perform assorted administration tasks.
Application DBA for Microsoft SQL Server databases. My tasks include support and maintenance of database hosted on Microsoft SQL Server instances.

Razorfish West Coast Microsoft Tech Lead 					Aug 2011 - Feb 2012
‚Ä¢	Off-shore Tech Lead for Microsoft projects. Tasks include tracking of status of projects, define staffing of projects and other organizational tasks.

Off-shore Developer for a Microsoft Retail Mobile Web				Aug 2011 ‚Äì Dec 2011
‚Ä¢	Off-shore developer ‚Äì and Tech Lead - for a new Microsoft site working with WCF data service, ASP.NET MVC 3, Windows Azure and SQL Azure. Tasks include assistance and coordination of the members of the team, coordination with a third party company working on a Windows Phone 7 application for that same site, development of back end data service for both the site and the WP7 application and deployment of updates into productions sites.

Off-shore Team Lead- Intel Learning Series Alliance Maintenance team		Apr 2011 ‚Äì Nov 2011
‚Ä¢	Team Lead of the offshore team working on the maintenance and upgrade of the sites for the Intel Learning Series Alliance. Tasks include assistance and coordination of the members of the team, communication with the on-site team, tracking of status of tasks, deployment of updates into productions sites, as well as other organizational tasks. 

Off-shore Team Lead- Intel Learning Series Alliance redesign of the site		May 2011 ‚Äì Aug. 2011
‚Ä¢	Team Lead of the offshore team working on the redesign effort for the Intel Learning Series Alliance site. Tasks include assistance and coordination of the members of the team, communication with the on-site team, tracking of status of tasks, development of the database supporting the site and stored procedures related to functionality provided by the sites. 

Off-shore Team Lead- Kraft Web Transformation					Oct. 2010 ‚Äì Apr 2011
‚Ä¢	Team Lead of the offshore team working on the transformation of all stand-alone and virtual directory sites. Tasks include assistance and coordination of the members of the team, communication with the on-site team and other organizational tasks.

Sharepoint 2007 developer ‚Äì Razorfish Career Portal				Sept. 2010 - Oct. 2010
‚Ä¢	Sharepoint 2007 developer dedicated to development and implementation of the site for Razorfish‚Äôs Career Portal. Tasks include team coordination, feature development and solution deployment. Using Agile methodology while having direct and daily communication with the client. The site went on to take the 12th place overall (with a score of 99/100) for the 2010 Inspire Awards Internal & External Communications Competition and was also a Competition Class Winner (Ref: http://www.lacp.com/2010inspire/top50.htm)
Sharepoint 2010 developer - Quintiles Intranet 					Aug. 2010 - Sept. 2010
‚Ä¢	Sharepoint 2010 developer dedicated to development and implementation of a complex intranet for a multinational pharmaceutical company. Tasks include web part development, taxonomy implementation, etc. Using Agile methodology while having direct and daily communication with the client. Using Sharepoint 2010 and Visual Studio 2010.

In-house DBA and lead SQL developer.  Defined technical requirements for the application database. Developed and documented Conceptual/Logical/Physical design. Documented logical and physical database design. Developed database object as T-SQL, stored procedures, user defined functions, triggers, views, complicated queries, indexing, etc.
Responsible for performance tunning and other administrative tasks.

education.schoolName: Escuela Superior de Comercio Libertador Gral San Martin

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: DBA at TimeTrade Systems, Inc.
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: March 10, 2017, Neeraj managed Leandro directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Leandro started working with us as a consultant in a small project.
He not only impressed us with his work quality but also very good 
attention to detail.
He became de-facto DBA for our offshore team in Argentina.
He successfully implemented database unit testing project exceeding 
expectations.
After that work, he helped us in lot of critical projects and always came out 
with flying colors.
His technical skills are always up to date and apart from SQL Server he is very good in Visual studio and PowerShell.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: QA Automation Engineer
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: May 16, 2016, Jonathan worked with Leandro on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
I had the pleasure to work with Leandro. He's an excellent professional. He's got a huge technical background. 
Leandro is also an awesome team worker. He always commits to the team goals. He's also all the time available to help any member of his team. 
.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Product Owner / Business Analyst
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: June 22, 2012, Guillermina worked with Leandro on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
Leandro is a multitasking person, always assuming far more responsibilities that he has to and achieving wonderful goals in the process. You can sit and relax during an emergency knowing Leandro will handle it.
He can be a tough negotiator as well as a careful partner and all of that comes with strong technical skills.
Good job!!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Staff Full Stack engineer
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: March 28, 2012, Leandro was senior to Gonzalo but didn't manage Gonzalo directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Leandro is a very smart and responsible person, his communication skills are great allowing him to quickly understand clients needs and requirements.
He's a very adaptable person in terms of technology and a fast learner.
As a leader, he can focus on small details without loosing the overview of the project keeping everybody on track, and maintaining calm in moments of tension, always guiding the team to produce solutions instead of blocking.
He's also a wonderful person to work with, and I enjoyed working with him a lot.

headline: CloudOps and DevOps Engineer at Witt-Gruppe | OTTO-Group
about:
Working in the IT area since the beginning of my work and student career, absorbing all kinds of knowledge to improve personal and work growth.
Always open to new job opportunities in search of expanding horizons of knowledge and challenges.
Always working at the head of large projects contributing my knowledge and learning from the best tools, platforms, and methodologies.

experience.location: Weiden in Der Oberpfalz, Baviera, Alemania
experience.description:
-AWS and GCP Infrastructure
- CI/CD management
- Kubernetes
- Terraform

- Infrastructure management and design

- Definition of new technologies together with suppliers
- Create new solutions to meet the needs of the company and the product accompanying the evolution.

- Lead of Cloud admin and DevOps team.
- Cloud architecture design and security (AWS). 
- Develop of media supply chain for HBO GO and HBO Max for Latam.
- Design of digital solutions for WarnerMedia International platforms.

experience.location: Defensa 599. Ciudad Aut√≥noma de Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.description:

- Management of incidents and implementations with external providers.
- Carry out implementation dates and reports to the product area.

- Functional analysis.
- Testing Mobile and Web.
- Maintenance of environments and QA servers
- Deploy and maintenance of software.
- Creation, execution, maintenance and automation of test cases.
- Generation of reports and metrics.

- Documentation of changes.

- Analysis of anomalies reported or detected, to improve operation and future versions.

SysAdmin - QA Automation - Proyect Flow Cablevision

- Follow-up of cases and tests in Jira and Confluence

- Implement new solutions for test automation and version regression.
- Manage QA servers - (Different environments)

Support analyst for Andreani.

experience.position: Real Time Assurance Analyst - (NOC) Cablevision Flow
experience.location: Juli√°n Segundo Ag√ºero 3440, Munro, Buenos Aires
experience.description:
Position: Real Time Assurance Analyst - Assisted Operation
Flow Cablevision platform implementation - OTT Live and VOD web streaming platform

Completed tasks:
- Proactive implementation, assurance and monitoring of the entire Cablevision Flow platform.
- Generation and tracking of 3pp tickets
- Diagnosis and resolution of incidents, generation of warnings, interruptions and escalations to international suppliers.
- Documentation and generation of monthly reports on the flow of resolved incidents.
- Analysis of anomalies reported or detected, to manage their subsequent resolution.
- Management of SNMP monitoring and control software (Nagios).
- Administration of Red Hat, CentOS and Ubuntu servers.
- Passive guards, alerted to incidents that require interaction with 3pp and other sectors of CVA
- Use of OPEN - Maximo IBM.

- Administration of Linux and solaris servers.
- Management of web control panels (Cpanel, WebsitePanel, DirectAdmin, Plesk)
- Mail servers (Exim, MailEnable, Hmailserver)
- Passive Guards, executing actions by scaling incidents, by the shift operators.
- Technical support to customers, telephone, chat and mail, through a LiveAgent ticket system. (personalized advice, about mail services, mailing, websites, FTP access etc.)
- Monitoring of the platform, through Nagios, Cetreon, Monitoring.
- Analysis of the behavior of the servers of the platform, Apache MySQL and NFS of mail and web.
- Repair of servers of our Datacenter located in Telecom.

experience.location: Bartolom√© Mitre 480, 1036 San Nicol√°s, Buenos Aires
experience.description:
- Consolidation of accounts.
- Resolution of problems of accounts issued by branches.
- High and low accounts at the business level.
- Direct support contact with Visa and Amex.
- QA of banking applications. (Advanced)
- Report failures and follow up on the solution.

experience.description:
- Windows Server  administration.
- Management of queries in MySQL.
- Administration and configuration of MDM based on customer needs.
- Control of policies agreed by the company towards employees.
- Inventory management and mobile equipment stock.
- Direct contact with managers and personalized support.
- Problem solving with direct suppliers.
- Platform update and maintenance.

- Technical support to provide solutions to the services provided by the company.
- Administration of Gnu / Linux and Windows servers.
- Installation of servers in Data Center.

- Real time assurance.
- Equipment monitoring.

headline: Bridging Product, Growth & Marketing | Helping Businesses and Entrepreneurs Optimize Brand & Demand Generation
about:
Great products don‚Äôt succeed just because they exist - they need a clear brand, a strong market fit, and a strategy that connects them with the right customers.

I specialize in growth strategy, product positioning, and marketing execution to help businesses attract the right audience and scale effectively. My experience spans from leading digital product teams to crafting go-to-market strategies that combine data, content, and user insights to drive engagement and revenue.

At TrueNode and Zolar, I led initiatives that merged data analytics, UX, SEO, and product-led growth strategies, ensuring that businesses weren‚Äôt just building great products, but also getting them in front of the right audience.

If you're looking to turn your expertise, product, or service into a brand that attracts customers, let's connect!
topSkills: Growth Strategies ‚Ä¢ Product Management ‚Ä¢ Digital Marketing

experience.description: As a Product Manager specializing in Growth, I played a pivotal role in driving Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) initiatives. I established a new CRO process and led over 50 experiments, achieving a 38% success rate‚Äîwell above the industry benchmark of 20%. A core aspect of my role involved collecting user insights and performing in-depth data analysis to identify high-impact opportunities and define test concepts. By running 2-3 experiments simultaneously, I ensured a steady stream of data-driven optimizations to enhance user acquisition, engagement, and retention.

Led product strategy and execution for multiple digital initiatives, ensuring business alignment with user needs and market trends. Integrated SEO, UX optimization, and product-led growth strategies to improve discoverability and user engagement.

As a Product Manager at TrueNode, a venture-driven product studio, I embraced the company's "product-obsession" methodology to drive impactful product development for new ventures. Acting as a co-founder within multi-disciplinary teams, I contributed to diverse, high-profile projects across industries, including a platform for freelancers and SMEs, a healthcare platform, a rebranding initiative for an industrial company website, and growth strategies for a hotel revenue management system.

In each project, I leveraged data analysis and user insights to shape product strategies, define core functionalities, and prioritize high-impact solutions. Collaborating with Symphony's culture-driven technology teams, I ensured seamless integration of product and engineering efforts, helping deliver innovative solutions for clients backed by top-tier investors such as Andreessen Horowitz, Founders Fund, and Fortune 10 companies.

Product management focused projects:
- Assess and improve the Digital Health accelerator program of a large Pharmaceutical
- Interim Product Manager for b2c clean tech start-up

Developed real-time pathogenic bacteria detection for the improvement Food Safety and Healthcare.

-Defined business model and product development roadmap
- Discovered and licensed over 13 patents to incorporate in product
- Led product development strategy for a high-performing technical of over 17 scientists and engineers
- Managed operational fundraising activites (+3m)
- Developed relationships with key multinational clients
- Led the laboratory set-up from an empty lab to a fully equipped and S2 and GMO II certified space

Responsible for the operation and improvement of off-market trading analysis & reporting, derivatives valuation using market data, and sales PnL analysis & reporting.
Lead multiple projects that improved operational efficiency significantly.

Quantified the potential improvements available in the commercial banking operations in Banco Industrial
Analysed and redesigned the Procurement and Accounts Payable operations of Monsanto benchmarking against other clients, advised on over 25 points of improvement

education.insights:
Activities and societies: E3 Initiative - Entrepreneur's Club,
ESADE Musicians
Activities and societies: Bocconi Football Team, Bocconi Welcoming Committee

education.description: Part of the MSc. Programme in ESADE included a week of travel to Mumbai, India, to meet with Digital Marketing Experts and local Entrepreneurs, in order to learn from their challenges and experiences.

volunteering.description: Led a project to develop a marketing plan for the NGO in order to attract new costumers while improving their organization.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline:
Senior Product Leader | Interim|Creative Problem-Solving | Start & Scale Up Growth
Open to interim & contract product roles
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: November 19, 2024, Catherine was senior to Facundo but didn't manage Facundo directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
I had the privilege of observing Facundo's exceptional contributions during his time at zolar, and I was consistently impressed by his dedication, expertise, and professionalism. Facundo approaches his work with a meticulous, data-driven mindset, ensuring that every decision he makes is grounded in  research and insightful analysis. His ability to blend analytical rigor with creative problem-solving sets him apart, as he consistently delivers unique and innovative solutions to complex challenges.

Facundo is a natural leader. He has the ability to inspire trust and respect among his peers, fostering collaboration and driving the team toward shared goals. His focus, adaptability, and commitment to excellence made him a key player in achieving successful outcomes on the growth team at zolar.

Facundo‚Äôs combination of technical acumen, strategic thinking, and leadership qualities make him a tremendous asset to any team or organization. I wholeheartedly recommend him to anyone looking for a driven and visionary professional who consistently raises the bar.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Senior UX Product Designer ‚Ä¢ SaaS | B2B | B2C
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: November 16, 2024, Nuno worked with Facundo on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
I had the privilege of working closely with Facundo within zolar‚Äôs growth teams. His proactive approach, analytical mindset, and focus on driving impact made collaboration seamless and enjoyable.

One of Facundo‚Äôs standout qualities is his ability to integrate data into decision-making processes. Whether we were brainstorming new initiatives, refining opportunity-solution trees, or prioritizing tasks, his reliance on data ensured that our choices were not only well-informed but also aligned with measurable goals. This approach consistently helped the team focus on high-impact projects and deliver tangible results. Facundo fostered an environment where ideas were openly exchanged, and decisions were guided by evidence, always striving for the best outcomes for the product and the business.

Facundo excelled at aligning diverse stakeholders around a shared vision with clear communication and drive. Everyone appreciated his clear communication and ability to keep things moving forward efficiently and effectively.

I strongly recommend Facundo for any role where a proactive, data-driven mindset and strong collaboration skills are valued.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Lead Product Manager at Zolar
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: September 19, 2024, Borys managed Facundo directly
receivedRecommendations.description: I had the pleasure of working closely with Facundo at Zolar, and I can confidently say that he is an exceptional Product Manager. His data-driven approach and strong analytical skills consistently guided his decision-making, ensuring every move was backed by insightful research and numbers. Facundo's attention to detail is remarkable, but what truly sets him apart is his creativity in generating innovative ideas. He's a natural leader and a driving force in the success of our product teams. Highly recommend!

headline: Talent Acquisition
about: I have been part of HR for +12 years and I would like to continue developing my skills & expertise in this area working to pursue a shared purpose. Excellent client-facing and relationship management skills, focused on delivering business results with proven capacity in leading high performance teams.

experience.description:
‚Ä¢ Spearhead the design and implementation of comprehensive HR processes, including seamless onboarding, efficient payroll management, and innovative people development programs, ensuring a smooth employee lifecycle from entry to exit.
‚Ä¢ Act as a trusted advisor, providing expert support on a diverse range of HR matters such as leave management, compensation strategies, and conflict resolution, effectively addressing and resolving employee issues.
‚Ä¢ Cultivate strong partnerships with external payroll and HR service providers, proactively managing payroll inquiries and ensuring accuracy and compliance with industry standards.
‚Ä¢ Champion internal communication initiatives, delivering clear and engaging messaging on HR topics to foster an informed and cohesive workforce.
‚Ä¢ Orchestrate training coordination and logistics, enhancing employee development opportunities and ensuring alignment with organizational goals.
‚Ä¢ Prepare and maintain meticulous documentation in accordance with labor legislation and local company regulations, safeguarding compliance and best practices.
‚Ä¢ Manage comprehensive personnel record-keeping and reporting systems, providing valuable insights for strategic decision-making and workforce planning.

I worked at the EUIPO - European Union Intellectual Property Office - as an interim, subcontracted by Adecco ETT, S.A. 

As part of the Staff Administration team, my main responsibility is to deal with staff entries and individual entitlements.

Summary of main responsibilities:
‚Ä¢	Assist in the establishment of rights and related calculations for statutory staff by applying the staff regulations and related implementing rules. 
‚Ä¢	Focus on processing and monitoring HR data for the annual travel process to ensure that the payment of the travel expenses incurred by the agent is processed in accordance to the European Commission requirements
‚Ä¢	Support with take-up employment procedures
‚Ä¢	Compile and update staff records, such as personal files, using of SuccessFactors
‚Ä¢	Assist with the day-to-day efficient operation of the HR office, such as: processing transfer pension rights, retirement requests, payment information updates.
‚Ä¢	Data input in the HR enterprise resource planning (ERP) tools and document management systems
‚Ä¢	Gather data and contribute to reports and statistics 
‚Ä¢	Drafting memos and communications
‚Ä¢	Maintain HR files and databases (document management and archiving)

Responsible for the Global Recruiting & Talent operations teams in BA HR Shared Services, which consists in 7 direct reports and a headcount of 50 team members, supporting clients located in NA, LATAM & EMEA. 
Building collaborative relationships with cross-functional partners & stakeholders of all levels and worldwide.
Customer service oriented: overseeing operational results and promoting process improvement within the teams. Track, measure and report KPIs and overall metrics. 
In charge of the performance management process (mid & final revision), succession & promotion plans, team's capacity.
Responsible for handling team's annual budget for promotions, open positions and forecast.
Mentoring and empowering my teams to grow within the organization and develop their skills & professional experience.

experience.position: Global Recruiting & Recognition Lead - Associate Manager
experience.description:
In addition to my previous responsibilities, I also became the team lead and career counselor of the people that supported the Recognition & Awards process globally (being responsible for a HC of 25 people with 6 direct reports).
The biggest challenge was to assume responsability for a porcess outside the Recruiting area while it was audited and revised. My main success was that I could effectivly generate synergies between the Ops Team located in BA & the Ops Team located in India so they could both cope with the increased workload and satisfied client¬¥s expectations. Regarding my role within the MD recruiting team, I was part of several process revisions to streamline the whole MD Recruiting process, including candidate
full life cycle, from an operational standpoint. I was part of the team who implemented the GDPR requirements so that the MD Recruiting process was compliant with this new policy.

Responsible for the Global Recruiting teams within HR Shared Services located in BA (7 direct reports and manage a HC of 20 people). I was responsible for ensuring our team capacity to manage daily workload, staffing & new joiner onboarding process. I also was in charge of the performance process by conducting meaningful conversations about performance, career development & training needs.
In parallel to these responsibilities, I continue developing my career in the MD Recruiting Team and I became the operational SME located in BA. I was responsible for the local recruiters on the back end process. I also developed my analytical skills and position myself as the main PoC for any MD data request, reports, metrics and KPIs to measure MD recruitment results.

Support MD Recruitment process for North America and EALA every step of the way from an operational perspective. Responsible for setting up interviews for candidates with Accenture Managing Directors, including logistics, reimbursements and travel arrangements as needed. Provide highly personalized and ensure a smooth candadite experience. Create and manage open roles and candidate profiles in the applicant tracking system to reflect the full lifecycle of the MD Recruitment process in real time. 
Create Purchase Orders so that Agencies can submit their invoices for their sourcing support. Order background checks and follow up as needed. Draft offer letter, populate offer grid in the system and manage offer letter approval process so that the candidate can e-sign it. Ensure that the hiring process from a back end PoV so that the onboarding sessions are properly set up.

I was responsible for coordinating the entire Leadership Referral process. I was in charge of processing all the referral submissions sent by Managing Directors and for MD roles. We were the liaison between referrers and local recruiters as one of our main responsibilities was to inform the referrers about the status of their submissions and follow up with local recruiters to check if there was any update on the candidate process.

Due to a reorganization of the team HRSS in BA, I joined the Gallia Recruitment Team. I had the opportunity to learn how the recruitment process works and manage the full life cycle of the candidate experience for those applicants located in France, Belgium and The Netherlands. I continued to be the main PoC for the contract creation activity, which was also transferred to
the Recruitment team under my scope. After a few months, I had the chance to be part of the transition of the recruitment support for Mauritius to BA and I became the main POC for this
process in HR Shared Services BA.

As part of the Gallia Personal Administration Team, one of the main tasks was performing the hire process in SAP for those employees located in France, Belgium and The Netherlands. I was responsible for uploading/updating employees record in SAP. In addition to this, I was in charge of editing the contracts for all employees located in France.

Cecilia is highly analytical and is definitely a strong player when it comes to HR matters and management. I would love to work with her again!

receivedRecommendations.givenAt: September 5, 2022, Lujan reported directly to Cecilia Ver√≥nica
receivedRecommendations.description: Ceci is an exceptional leader. I've had the pleasure of working under Ceci¬¥s leadership for almost 7 years. about:
üöÄ As a Legal and Contract Management professional, I help companies- from fast-growing startups to global enterprises- navigate complex legal challenges and drive business growth.  Over the past decade, I've lead and supported global legal teams at organizations like Google and Accenture, managing the full lifecycle of commercial agreements across technology, marketing, energy, logistics, and pharmaceutical sectors.

My experience spans multiple regions ‚Äî the US, Canada, Latin America, and Europe ‚Äî which has shaped my adaptability and business-oriented approach. I thrive in dynamic environments where legal and operational challenges intersect, bringing innovation, clarity, and efficiency to contracting and compliance processes.

I‚Äôm passionate about Legal Tech and building scalable, efficient legal frameworks that reduce friction, accelerate decision-making, and empower teams to innovate confidently.

If you‚Äôre looking for a legal partner who combines deep expertise with a practical, global mindset, I‚Äôd be happy to connect.

experience.description: Viviana Gonz√°lez De Marco, en el rol de Psicoterapeuta Hol√≠stica, es tanto din√°mica como transformadora en el mundo actual, y se mueve a un ritmo vertiginoso. Esta escritora que soy yo, no te dice lo que debes pensar, sino que te gu√≠a en c√≥mo pensar por ti mismo. Te empodera para examinar tus valores, tus deseos y tus sue√±os, y te inspira a tomar decisiones basadas en la autenticidad en lugar de la conformidad.

A medida que lees sus palabras, te das cuenta de que la verdad es un viaje personal y din√°mico. Las viejas creencias son desafiadas, y en su lugar, descubres una perspectiva en constante evoluci√≥n que refleja la complejidad de la vida.

Gracias a esta escritora, te das cuenta de que tu viaje no tiene por qu√© estar definido por las expectativas de otros, sino que puedes caminar por la senda de la verdad, explorando las luces y sombras de tu propia alma. experience.description: Viviana Gonz√°lez De Marco, en el rol de Psicoterapeuta Hol√≠stica, es tanto din√°mica como transformadora en el mundo actual, y se mueve a un ritmo vertiginoso. Como profesional, dedica a ayudar a las personas a desbloquear su m√°ximo potencial, superar obst√°culos y lograr sus metas personales y profesionales. Como experta en desarrollo personal, utiliza un enfoque hol√≠stico para empoderar a los clientes, permiti√©ndoles tomar el control de sus vidas, tomar decisiones impactantes y alcanzar nuevos niveles de √©xito y satisfacci√≥n.

Una escritora que te gu√≠a en c√≥mo transitar la vida con autenticidad, revelando que muchas de las creencias tradicionales que nos inculcaron no son necesariamente como nos las pintaban, es alguien que desaf√≠a las normas y estereotipos convencionales. Imagina a una gu√≠a intr√©pida que, con palabras que son faros de sabidur√≠a, te muestra el camino de la vida como nunca antes lo hab√≠as visto. Esta escritora que soy yo misma, no se adhiere a las viejas f√≥rmulas y dogmas, sino que te invita a explorar las luces y sombras de tu propia existencia con curiosidad y valent√≠a.

Mi pluma, es una linterna que ilumina los rincones oscuros de las creencias arraigadas. Te ayudo a cuestionar esas ense√±anzas anticuadas que a menudo limitan tu percepci√≥n y te insta a abrazar una verdad m√°s amplia y comprensiva.

Esta escritora que soy yo, no te dice lo que debes pensar, sino que te gu√≠a en c√≥mo pensar por ti mismo. Te empodera para examinar tus valores, tus deseos y tus sue√±os, y te inspira a tomar decisiones basadas en la autenticidad en lugar de la conformidad.

A medida que lees sus palabras, te das cuenta de que la verdad es un viaje personal y din√°mico. Las viejas creencias son desafiadas, y en su lugar, descubres una perspectiva en constante evoluci√≥n que refleja la complejidad de la vida.

Gracias a esta escritora, te das cuenta de que tu viaje no tiene por qu√© estar definido por las expectativas de otros, sino que puedes caminar por la senda de la verdad, explorando las luces y sombras de tu propia alma. Sus escritos son una invitaci√≥n a abrazar la autenticidad, a cuestionar lo establecido y a descubrir la belleza en la complejidad de la vida.

Una psicoterapeuta, puede desempe√±ar un papel esencial en tu bienestar emocional y psicol√≥gico, brind√°ndote las herramientas y el apoyo necesarios para superar desaf√≠os, mejorar tu calidad de vida y alcanzar tus objetivos personales. headline: CPO at Igrowker | Product Engineer | Software Developer
about:
I lead product strategy at Igrowker, driving decisions that shape both our tech teams and the evolution of our platform. I design and streamline processes that connect hands-on training with real market needs, and I‚Äôm currently working on integrating AI as a core layer of the product experience.

Between 2024 and 2025, we launched over 50 MVPs and certified 900+ IT professionals from 19 countries‚Äîboosting their job readiness through real-world, team-based projects.

Bridging skills and outcomes? I‚Äôm all in. Drop me a line.
topSkills: Creative Problem Solving ‚Ä¢ Product Management ‚Ä¢ Product Strategy ‚Ä¢ Product Architecture

experience.description:
My work at Igrowker focuses on developing product strategies that integrate functional design, technological scalability, and applied artificial intelligence. I specialize in defining the product vision, shaping the roadmap, and designing the product architecture that drives the continuous evolution of our training platforms and professional certification programs.

I‚Äôm responsible for implementing processes that align user experience, operational efficiency, and business goals. I oversee the development of professional certifications aligned with international standards (ISO/IEC 17024), ensuring consistency between product design, competency validation, and the real needs of the tech market.

Between 2024 and 2025, our learners launched over 50 digital products, and we trained more than 900 IT professionals across 19 countries‚Äîcombining product, technology, and AI to build an educational ecosystem that prioritizes skill applicability, learning traceability, and continuous performance improvement.

I co-founded Igrowker in late 2023 and was responsible for designing and developing our scalable, high-performance e-learning platform from the ground up using TypeScript, React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and Next.js. This tool enabled junior IT professionals to train both their technical and soft skills online, with access to content specifically created to support their professional growth in the tech industry.

Igrowker was selected twice to join Lanzadera, the #1 startup accelerator in Spain and one of the most respected in Europe. This double selection validated the scalability, social impact, and overall strength of its business model.

Throughout the program, I worked closely with top-tier mentors specializing in growth, metrics, investment, and product development. The experience helped refine the strategic roadmap, optimize internal processes, and apply the Modelo de Calidad Total (TQM) ‚ÄîLanzadera‚Äôs core business philosophy, inspired by Mercadona‚Äîto drive continuous improvement and long-term value creation.

Between 2024 and 2025, Igrowker achieved:

- Trained over 900 junior IT professionals from 19 countries
- Developed 50+ MVPs in 6-week cycles
- Applied 20+ technologies across real-world projects
- Delivered a 80-hour training program (74h hands-on + 6h online classes)
- Offered optional professional certifications developed in line with international professional standards
- Achieved a 78% program completion rate
- Designed and built a scalable AI powered e-learning platform fully in-house

Participation in Lanzadera marked a pivotal milestone in establishing Igrowker as a globally minded tech education platform with tangible impact and sustainable scalability.

Worked on the development and maintenance of Meenut‚Äôs AI-powered web platform, focused on optimizing workplace meetings. Contributed to the implementation of user-facing features and UI improvements using Next.js, TypeScript, React, and TailwindCSS, ensuring performance, usability, and visual consistency.

Designed and developed custom websites for clients across the United States, Argentina, Spain, and Portugal. Worked with modern technologies such as React, TypeScript, Chakra UI, Node.js, MongoDB, and MySQL, delivering scalable and responsive solutions tailored to each business need.

Worked on the design of digital products and user experiences for hospitality-sector clients in Spain. Led UX research and interface design processes to create intuitive, conversion-oriented platforms tailored to each business model. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver functional prototypes and design systems aligned with client goals and brand identity.

A company specialized in visual design and production for events, operating in 13 countries, including the U.S., Australia, Spain, Argentina, and Brazil. With a team of highly skilled designers, we provided creative solutions for international clients, ensuring quality and differentiation in every project.

Our structure combined efficient management with a global expansion strategy, establishing Decofesty as a key player in the industry. Like many businesses in the event sector, the pandemic impacted operations, leading to its closure.

volunteering.description:
The members of the Amigos en el Camino organization distribute hundreds of kilos of prepared food, as well as hygiene products, school supplies for children, clothing, and footwear to people experiencing homelessness. My role was to prepare the food that was distributed at various locations in the Autonomous City of Buenos Aires to individuals without financial resources or housing. The organization is sustained exclusively through contributions made by its members and does not receive any funding from government or private entities.

element.headline: CPO at Igrowker | Product Engineer | Software Developer
element.about:
I lead product strategy at Igrowker, driving decisions that shape both our tech teams and the evolution of our platform. I design and streamline processes that connect hands-on training with real market needs, and I‚Äôm currently working on integrating AI as a core layer of the product experience.

Between 2024 and 2025, we launched over 50 MVPs and certified 900+ IT professionals from 19 countries‚Äîboosting their job readiness through real-world, team-based projects.

Bridging skills and outcomes? I‚Äôm all in. Drop me a line.
element.topSkills: Creative Problem Solving ‚Ä¢ Product Management ‚Ä¢ Product Strategy ‚Ä¢ Product Architecture

experience.description:
My work at Igrowker focuses on developing product strategies that integrate functional design, technological scalability, and applied artificial intelligence. I specialize in defining the product vision, shaping the roadmap, and designing the product architecture that drives the continuous evolution of our training platforms and professional certification programs.

I‚Äôm responsible for implementing processes that align user experience, operational efficiency, and business goals. I oversee the development of professional certifications aligned with international standards (ISO/IEC 17024), ensuring consistency between product design, competency validation, and the real needs of the tech market.

Between 2024 and 2025, our learners launched over 50 digital products, and we trained more than 900 IT professionals across 19 countries‚Äîcombining product, technology, and AI to build an educational ecosystem that prioritizes skill applicability, learning traceability, and continuous performance improvement.

I co-founded Igrowker in late 2023 and was responsible for designing and developing our scalable, high-performance e-learning platform from the ground up using TypeScript, React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and Next.js. This tool enabled junior IT professionals to train both their technical and soft skills online, with access to content specifically created to support their professional growth in the tech industry.

Igrowker was selected twice to join Lanzadera, the #1 startup accelerator in Spain and one of the most respected in Europe. This double selection validated the scalability, social impact, and overall strength of its business model.

Throughout the program, I worked closely with top-tier mentors specializing in growth, metrics, investment, and product development. The experience helped refine the strategic roadmap, optimize internal processes, and apply the Modelo de Calidad Total (TQM) ‚ÄîLanzadera‚Äôs core business philosophy, inspired by Mercadona‚Äîto drive continuous improvement and long-term value creation.

Between 2024 and 2025, Igrowker achieved:

- Trained over 900 junior IT professionals from 19 countries
- Developed 50+ MVPs in 6-week cycles
- Applied 20+ technologies across real-world projects
- Delivered a 80-hour training program (74h hands-on + 6h online classes)
- Offered optional professional certifications developed in line with international professional standards
- Achieved a 78% program completion rate
- Designed and built a scalable AI powered e-learning platform fully in-house

Participation in Lanzadera marked a pivotal milestone in establishing Igrowker as a globally minded tech education platform with tangible impact and sustainable scalability.

Worked on the development and maintenance of Meenut‚Äôs AI-powered web platform, focused on optimizing workplace meetings. Contributed to the implementation of user-facing features and UI improvements using Next.js, TypeScript, React, and TailwindCSS, ensuring performance, usability, and visual consistency.

Designed and developed custom websites for clients across the United States, Argentina, Spain, and Portugal. Worked with modern technologies such as React, TypeScript, Chakra UI, Node.js, MongoDB, and MySQL, delivering scalable and responsive solutions tailored to each business need.

Worked on the design of digital products and user experiences for hospitality-sector clients in Spain. Led UX research and interface design processes to create intuitive, conversion-oriented platforms tailored to each business model. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver functional prototypes and design systems aligned with client goals and brand identity.

A company specialized in visual design and production for events, operating in 13 countries, including the U.S., Australia, Spain, Argentina, and Brazil. With a team of highly skilled designers, we provided creative solutions for international clients, ensuring quality and differentiation in every project.

Our structure combined efficient management with a global expansion strategy, establishing Decofesty as a key player in the industry. Like many businesses in the event sector, the pandemic impacted operations, leading to its closure.
